property.name: text
property.value:
This models a track for vehicles which are either moving at the specified fixed speed through the track, stalled waiting to get into the track, or stalled waiting to get out of the track. A vehicle will stall waiting to get into the track if the previously arrived vehicle in the track has arrived too recently so that the minimumSpacing would be violated. A vehicle will be stalled waiting to get out of the track if a pause input has arrived with value true. When a pause input arrives with value false, any vehicles that are stalled waiting to depart will be sent to the output one at a time with spacing between them equal to minimumSpacing/speed.
Note that if the capacity has been reached and a new vehicle arrives anyway, an exception will be triggered and execution will stop.

property.name: script
note
property.value: NOTE: To see the script, invoke Open Actor

entity.name: Ramp
entity.doc: Create a sequence of tokens with increasing value
